title: 看过minecraft的那个mv的多知道

txt_content:

replies.author: Tototiger
replies.txt_content: 唱歌的那个叫TryHardNinja..皮肤是CaptainSparklez制作的..歌词也是CaptainSparklez写的..歌曲其实是DJ Got Us Fallin' in Love，MV是改编自这首歌的..整个动画也是CaptainSparklez所作，牛B..

replies.author: Tototiger
replies.txt_content: 另外这个根本不是原创，楼主不要坑爹啊..

replies.author: Tototiger
replies.txt_content:
这才是原版..
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 36&highlight=MV

replies.author: zeroro
replies.txt_content: 这是我自己做的，我没想到有人抢先了~
